title: How to get help with PR?
body:
Hi,

I have a PR up that should fix an issue with the MSBuild expression parser.  The PR is here:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/3165

I posted previously here:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/3163
but got no replies.  Can anyone with MSBuild help me with this?

Thank you so much.

nodes.body: @rainersigwald Maybe, but how do I actually get help?  Is there any procedure for this?  Thanks so much.
